SugarCRM | Various Locations; REMOTE | Fulltime

SugarCRM is hiring for a wide variety of positions, both technical and otherwise, in a number of locations, including remote. You can see all our open positions here: http://jobvite.com/m?3ZlTshwr

In particular, we're currently looking for a Senior Software Engineer with 2+ years of Ruby experience, rails experience a plus: http://app.jobvite.com/m?3EHtNhwn ; Cupertino, CA or Raleigh, NC or Remote

I've been at Sugar for a nearly 4 years now and it's honestly the best job I've ever had. If you have any questions about working here, feel free to email me at jwigglesworth@sugarcrm.com ; put "Hacker News" in your subject line so that I actually see your email.
